article.title: Article
about.introduction.caption: Master of Information Technology student at the University of Auckland. Expected to graduate by the end of 2024.
about.introduction: Hello, I am Laiyu Pei, born in Guangdong (China) in 2001, and I graduated with a bachelor's degree from the University of Auckland in New Zealand. I enjoy browsing Zhihu and Bilibili, reading technical articles, and playing games. Besides that, I am interested in development, such as building web applications based on React. Of course, I don't limit myself to a single tech stack; I also have project experience with various front-end and back-end frameworks like Vue3, Express.js, .Net Core, and Django.
